TopicTitle: Renaming Vessel in VAB to "Kerbol System" moves you to tracking station

Articles.Content:
I attempted to rename my vehicle to "Kerbol System Recovery Vehicle" (yes, I lost Kerbals in orbit around the Mun).  Upon typing the 'M' (i.e. Kerbol System) I was immediately dumped to the tracking station view.

This happened everytime I attempted this.

yeah, M is for MAP... that's Map view - and as with many many other bug reports they claimed they fixed it in 0.1.1 but they have not - it is obvious no team size would have been sufficient to fix that many bugs (as in patch note) - so they just said they fixed those - but no... now it is time to start going and fixing those one by one, systematizing new bug-reports and doing fix-and-thorough-test on old ones.

Oh those amazing years of KSP2 development ahead of us!
Can confirm this issue
